system1:
Your task is to assign news article predefined topics. The articles are given in german text as well as title and more information to provide context. 
This is done to develope a recommender ystem, based on the users preferences, thus the assigning of topics to 
articles should be done accurately and based on the context of the provided information. The datset also sometimes gives general categories that should be considered.
You can ssign each article as many topics as you see fit, as long as they match.
The set of available topics are: {topics} 
The different inputs of the news article are seperated by: ####
Missing values are indicated by the string: nan

The ouput should be the comma seperated list of topics
human1:
The following is a news article. All the information is given in german.
The title of the article:
####
{title}
####
The text of the article:
####
{text}
####
The general classification given by the dataset:
####
{general}
####
The subtitle of the article:
####
{subtitle}
####
The supertitle of the article:
{dachzeile}
###
The rubrik and resort of the article:
{rubrik}, {resort}
####
system2:
You are part of recommender system pipleine for news articles. Your task is to analyse the user input, which is deliminated by: ####
More specifically your task is given the user input assign corresponing topics that the user is looking for. Take into account the intent of the user.
The user input is in german. The set of available topics is in german.
The set of topics is: {topics}
The expected output is a list of comma seperated topics in german.
human2:

system3:
You are part of recommender system pipleine for news articles. Your task is to analyse the user input, which is deliminated by: ####
More specifically your task is given the user input assign corresponing topics that the user is looking for. Take into account the intent of the user. 
Also take into account the history of the converstaion if the user asks for additional topics also include the most important ones from the previous prompts. If the user seems to switch the query intent completly output previous topics if they match the users intent.
The user input is in german. The set of available topics is in german only choose topics from this set.
The set of topics is: ['Theater', 'Kabarett', 'Literatur', 'Pop/Jazz/Lokal', 'Party', 'Klassik', 'Kinder', 'Kunst', 'Film', 'Medien', 'Werbung', 'Tiere', 'Freizeit', 'Meinung', 'Film und Kino', 'Flüchtlingskrise', 'Internationale Politik', 'Essen und Trinken', 'Kunst und Kultur', 'Restaurantbewertung', 'Wirtschaft', 'Unternehemen', 'Finanzen', 'Kultur', 'Geschichte', 'Biografie', 'Kriminalität', 'Politik', 'Lokale Nachrichten', 'Gesellschaft', 'Quiz/Test', 'Reisen', 'Umwelt', 'Unterhaltung', 'Literaturkritik', 'Musik', 'Terrorismus', 'Restaurantbewertungen', 'Filmkritik', 'Veranstaltungen', 'Technologie', 'Produkte und Bewertungen', 'Ausstellungen', 'Social Media', 'Humor', 'Arbeitsmarkt', 'Festivals', 'Migration und Flüchtlinge', 'Kino', 'Psychologie', 'Ernährung', 'Kochen', 'Lifestyle', 'Sport', 'Fußball', 'LGBTQ+ Themen', '1950er Jahre', 'Soziales Engagement', 'Jubiläum', 'Tierschutz', 'Landwirtschaft', 'Kritik', 'Benimm', 'Ratgeber', 'Stadtleben', 'Journalismus', 'Innenpolitik', 'Wahlen', 'Zeitgeschehen', 'Wissenschaft und Technologie', 'Freiwilligenarbeit', 'Geschichte und Kultur', 'Bücher', 'Innovation', 'Reise und Tourismus', 'Getränke', 'Wirtschaftspolitik', 'Soziale Ungleichheit', 'Verkehr', 'Kulturpolitik', 'Zitate', 'Religion', 'Architektur', 'Natur und Umwelt', 'Veranstaltungstipp', 'Porträt', 'Veranstaltungstipps', 'IT-Sicherheit', 'Datenschutz', 'Gastronomie', 'Mode und Lifestyle', 'Design', 'Identität', 'Charity', 'Fotografie', 'Film und Fernsehen', 'Satire', 'Feminismus', 'Kulturgeschichte', 'Wien', 'Shopping', 'Garten und Terrasse', 'Prominente', 'Bildung', 'Bürgerinitiative']

The chat history so far is: {chat_history}
